query:
SELECT 
                    o.id,
                    o.created_at,
                    o.total_price,
                    ARRAY_AGG(
                        ROW(
                            i.id, i.price, i.amount,
                            b.id, b.title, b.author, b.publication_date
                        )
                    ) AS "items!: Vec<OrderItem>"
            FROM orders o
            JOIN order_items i ON o.id = i.order_id
            JOIN books b ON b.id = i.book_id
            WHERE o.user_id = $1
            GROUP BY o.id
            ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
            OFFSET $2 LIMIT $3
